website_summaries.verdict: A stylish and moderately priced pair of rechargeable active shutter glasses for use with some DLP-Link projectors.
pros: Once charged, these 3D glasses can last for 90 days on standby or run continuously for approximately 30 hrs
The glasses are easy to operate and feature the latest shutter technology which eliminates flickering and crosstalk
cons: These active shutter glasses are compatible with Optoma, BenQ, Sharp, Acer, Samsung, and Mitsubishi, but not Epson or Sony

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Found some $5 3D Blurays at Big Lots so I thought I would get some glasses to try them out on my Benq 2050A projector. The movies look great glasses very easy to use. if they last and hold a charge they will be perfect. Update: Had these for 3 months. They last about 15 movies before needing recharge still working great. Ordered 2 more pair. 2nd Update: Had an arm break on glasses contacted seller received replacement in 2 days... no questions ask!
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Harper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 3D VIEWING EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: These glasses deliver a great 3D viewing experience! I opened the box and found a nice zippered case that includes the glasses, a cleaning cloth, a small printed instruction sheet, and a USB charging cord. I turned them on per the included instructions (very small text, use a magnifier if you're old like me) and they immediately synced to my Wowoto T8E projector HDMI'ed to a Sony 3D BluRay player, and within literally seconds the show was a go!!! The 3D is clear with no detectable ghosting. I wear glasses and these fit comfortably over my prescription lenses and frames. Recommend you give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: DaveR

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these glasses, especially for this price. The lens are perfectly clear and do not darken the image as much as other glasses I've used. The power button is great because it also cycles through the lens shift. Its very convenient to not have to open up the projector menu and go back and fort trying to figure out if its set right or not. Just click the button above your nose and you are good. The cases that come with these are nice and the glasses themselves appear sturdy enough even though they are very light.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Poole

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these 3D glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have no previous experience with 3D glasses but I'm very pleased with these. They're really hassle free, you just hit the power button and they work. If they don't detect a 3D signal they turn themselves off after about 30 seconds to conserve battery life. Speaking of battery life, I charged them up when I got them and I've watched about a half dozen movies and several dozen YouTube clips with them and still have not had to charge them. Impressive! They're comfortable too, and fit over my regular glasses with no problem at all. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wright

customer_reviews.title: A Great Set
customer_reviews.text: These were quickly charged and worked beautifully. They arrived very fast, too, and came in their own hard cases with microfiber cloths and inside felt-like bags. The instructions had few english words but there's not much to figure out, you plug them in, charge them, and turn them on. I have an Optoma 143X and they paired instantly upon turning them on (after the 3D image was up). Note that the stickers on the lenses are for taking off the protective film. I thought at first they left a residue, but you're supposed to pull them half off, then the full-lens protector comes off with them on both sides. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Delta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic with the Optoma UHD 30 / Elikiv customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of these glasses initially to test and they were fantastic so we ordered another 4 pairs. One of the pairs we received would not power on, I wrote the seller, they shipped out a replacement set right away, to put this is perspective I received the failed unit on July 23rd and I received the replacement today July 27th, I call that excellent customer service and will certainly purchase more items from this company if they sell anything that I need, or if I need more glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Super Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality active shutter glasses for DLP link TV's, these come with cloth pouch, hard case, cleaning cloth, and USB cable. I bought two for my 2011 Mitsubishi 73" 3D TV, do not need 3D emitter as TV has DLP link. Both pairs charge in less than 2 hours, promise 35 hrs use time, but cannot yet confirm this claim. But they give excellent 3D image quality, reasonably comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R. H Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Nice if they work
customer_reviews.text: I have one of the Optoma DLP 3D projectors on the list. My factory (bulky) Optoma glasses work just fine. These glasses would never acknowledge a 3D signal. They acted like they wanted to for a second, but just stayed in normal mode. I would have returned this pair anyway. One set looked like it had been opened and there was a splotch of adhesive on one of the lenses. I wish they did work. They are much lighter than the Optoma glass. They are charged by USB.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These glasses work fantastic. Long lasting battery, no ghosting images and has many functions not listed such as a quick select parallax converter setting (press the on button while watching a movie). Watching a high refresh rate projector/monitor/tv (120hz and higher) with these glasses (144hz refresh rate) is a real treat. High refresh rate 3D gaming with these glasses is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Yoker

customer_reviews.title: These work great with our Optoma HD33 Projector
customer_reviews.text: We have 8 of these and they work great. They are much more comfortable on your head than the Optoma brand glasses. These have longer sides and curved around your head as well as a softer touch to your head. The Optoma brand were always too tight on the sides or your head. These feel great and the 3D picture is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Ross

customer_reviews.title: The best for what they do
customer_reviews.text: These 3D glasses are very comfortable and the picture quality is the same as glasses I paid 80 dollars each for a few years ago (don't think it's a good idea to mention competitors name) which is high picture quality and the price is the greatest I don't think you could find better.
customer_reviews.author: K. Badders

customer_reviews.title: A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, clear view, quick compatibility with projector, charge quickly. I really like the picture quality. I like the case, cloth and charger. I don't like that it didn't have a plug to connect to the charger usb chord.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: great quality 3d glasses for projectors
customer_reviews.text: I use these with a set of Viewsonic projectors I have and the 3d quality is better than many of the theaters I have been to. The build is way better than the skinny versions I have for the 3D TV, they don't break.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: they work with my optoma hd143x 3d ready projector
customer_reviews.text: They work, once you figure out,on your own,how to use because instructions are the translated from Chinese to English kind. Also noticed that you sometimes have to press power button a second time to get pictures lined up right, and that's my only other issue with them... the fact that the power button is hard to locate and press while on eyes... that is easily solved by removing from eyes and then pressing, and then putting back on eyes to see if it worked. A little tedious, but a solution none the less...
customer_reviews.author: jim kelly

customer_reviews.title: Work great, can get irritating after long use.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses work perfectly. Easy setup and great 3D. However, they aren't ideal for longer movies. The top and sides of my nose were starting to hurt after 45 minutes. Only con, but for 35 bucks, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake N.

customer_reviews.title: These work. It's 3D.
customer_reviews.text: The 3D effect worked perfectly and the glasses paired up effortlessly. I don't particularly like how dim everything looks while using, though. Need more testing to figure out if it's worth using. I'd say, only worth it if your image source is capable of very bright levels to counter the dimming of the active shutter technology.
customer_reviews.author: Dave the Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Fits ok, works great.
customer_reviews.text: The image is great and syncs fine. Pressing the button to sync works great. I do have issues with the ergonomicness. doesn't fit all that comfortably. Hard for me to explain it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: These really fit well and stay put. The pair I had prior to this were loose and could not be worn over glasses. I loved it mainly because of its wider glasses and over the glass design.
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: A very good product.
customer_reviews.text: For a first time user of 3d shutter glasses I think they do a great job. Takes a little getting used to, but they work as advertised. Big Hero 6 was great in 3D. You might have to push the button a couple of times to find what you like, but a very good product
customer_reviews.author: Lamar G.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of 3D glasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair to use with my Vivitek projector and they work great! The comfort level of the glasses is really nice and I have no complaints. I would recommend these DLP 3D glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: They work great with my projector (Optoma HD27HDR). Nice bright picture and flawless 3D. No artifacts, no crosstalk or ghosting for me.
customer_reviews.author: RichP

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but not compatible with our older models
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality feel but did not work for our samsung un60h6400 nor did they work for our 3d epson 2045.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best DLP glasses
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 pairs the first time and they’re so great that I’ve ordered 2 more pairs. Easy to connect, seem to hold a charge for quite a while and love that they have the button to change dominant eye!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee & Josh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the two pack - one pair was perfect and worked flawlessly with our projector but the second pair had a huge black mark between the two layers of the lens that could not be wiped off.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Beware !!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont get it ? Bought this after reading the reviews... the view is not good , confort ? What confort ???? I just tried to watch a full movie forget it my nose hurt , these are the cheapest glasses ever wear. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best 3D Glasses I have purchased for reasonable price. They do sit a bit higher but still perfectly comfortable to wear for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed and a great value
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for watching 3D movies. They fit over my glasses just fine and are the perfect option for performance and price.
customer_reviews.author: KimTech

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture and good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I already wear glasses so I was worried about how the extra weight of 3-D glasses would affect me. It feels no different than watching a 3-D movie at the movie theater. The battery last at least 2-1/2 hours, but probably much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant about purchasing these as the prices out there really range in price but im glad i did...best 3d picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why they don’t work with my DLP projector
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to turn them on or why they aren’t working with my DLP projector. It’s a bummer because they seem to be working fine with everyone else’s
customer_reviews.author: mark white

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 3d glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair to go with my beng ht2150st projector. Glasses work well, are comfortable, and even work well over glasses! Sync up fine with beng ht2150st. Came with charge cable, and microfiber bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance that they will work
customer_reviews.text: Faulty . don’t know whether the product ur gonna get will work or not . I Ordered 2 glasses. One works and one doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: Amazon warrior

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: They don’t work. They say they work with DLP but not my projector.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Driver not honest? Didn't need to lie?
customer_reviews.text: So the glasses seem great, but the driver said they handed it directly to a resident.. And that did not happen.. It was just fine them placing it on the porch, but I don't like the dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: They really work and will be getting some more for 3D outdoor movie night
customer_reviews.text: Works great and nice Casey’s for glasses we are using a Optoma UHD30 True 4K UHD Gaming Projecter
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wild

customer_reviews.title: Good price, works as described
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect with my BenQ HT3550 Projector. Typical size, but wish manufacturer's made a bigger lens and better wrap around
customer_reviews.author: Chazz Summer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is the only problem.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses work perfect. The 3D quality from my BenQ projector was amazing with these. The only problem with them is they are not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Carter

customer_reviews.title: Dont work with all DLP projectors
customer_reviews.text: Have have an Optima dlp link projector and they dont work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Optoma GT5600
customer_reviews.text: The glasses connect fine but the 3D is all over the place
customer_reviews.author: ysle33

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was able to watch 3D at a low cost. Hood build quality and came with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to wear on top of existing glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to wear on top of existing glasses. That is the only reason for less stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: The glasses at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Good glasses at this price point, They automatically connected to my BenQ projector. The 3D looks amazing and the glasses have a nice snug fit and Their customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely grab these glasses for 3d experience
customer_reviews.text: The best 3D glasses for the best price. Real VR experience. Comes with a soft case. Cleaning cloth and hard case. Easy to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Asim Haider hashmi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Good battery life. Light weight. So far so good. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sury

customer_reviews.title: Needs new case. Glasses are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Case is cheap and doesn’t last. Recommend buying another case for them
customer_reviews.author: Tyler P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Intro to DLP Link Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have a VAVA 4k Ultra Short Throw projector and have been meaning to get some affordable DLP Link glasses for a while now. These glasses work well, but are not the greatest over top of my existing glasses I need to see ;) I get by as 3D is pretty much a novelty but had they been a little bigger it would have gone from small annoyance to hardly noticeable. If you don't wear glasses, these fit great and keep you in the action. I would recommend these are they are a fantastic price and worked flawlessly with my setup and are very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bronder

customer_reviews.title: Super amazing 3D glasses 🤓
customer_reviews.text: Now these 3D glasses is my best pairs blue 🔵 and black ⚫️ color design is just fantastic also no motion sickness 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩
customer_reviews.author: The Movie King👑  (Todd Smith)

product_meta.title: BOBLOV DLP Link 3D Glasses Active Shutter 144Hz Rechargeable for All DLP-Link 3D Projectors, Can't Used for TVs, Compatible with BenQ, Optoma, Dell, Acer, Viewsonic DLP Projector (Blue-1 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue-1 PackOverview:
BOBLOV JX-30 3D DLP-Link Active Shutter Glasses for viewing 3D images and 3D visions from DLP Link 3D Projectors,Support 96~144Hz DLP-Link such as Optoma/BenQ/Sharp/Acer/Samsung/Mitsubishi series DLP projector. Build-in rechargeable battery, which can hold a charge for up to 45 hours of use. JX-30 net weight is just 33g,very light,comfortable wearing,and the excellent LCD lens will offer bright and sharp 3D experience for you.

Warm tip:
If you cannot make sure if our glasses can work with your projector, there are 2 ways to confirm it
1:The 3D signal receiving window can receive the DLP-Link signal. As soon as you use 96-144Hz DLP-Link 3D projector and connect thru 3D image source,our glasses can work perfect with your projector.
2: Or if your projector has the logo of “DLP 3D Ready” below, our glasses also can work

1.DLP link technology working mode
2.Micro USB rechargeable 3.7V Lithium Battery,standby time 180 days,
3.Continuous working 45 hours
4.Super fast 144Hz refresh rate.
5.Low-power design,can charge by USB.
6.Compatible with Optoma/BenQ/Sharp/Acer/Samsung/Mitsubishi series DLP projector
7.Excellent lenses offer bright and sharp 3D experience;
8.Adopt the newest active shutter technology, high definition and no flickering or crosstalk
9.Auto power off function, save energy and stable.


Specification:
Brand: BOBLOV
Size: For Adult
Color: Blue
Ratio: 1000:1±200
Frequency: 96/100/120/144Hz
Working Current: <1.2mA
Work Hours: 45±5hr
Battery Lifespan: 0°C-45°C
Storage Temperature: -10°C-60°C
Power Supply: 3.7V 80mAH
Transmission: 38%±2
Response Time: 2ms±0.5ms
View Angle: 150°（L/R 75°)
SYNC Operation: White light DLP.Link
Work Humidity: 20%-80%RH
Atmospheric Pressure: 86kPa-106kPa
feature_bullets: ❤【Quick compatibility with DLP-LINK projector】❤ The Active Shutter 3D Glasses use "DLP Link" as their sync method, quickly works with all DLP Link projectors, Compatible with Optoma/BenQ/Acer/Vivitek/Panasonic/Dell/Viewsonic/LG/Samsung/Mitsubishi dlp-link projectors. (Note: Can't Compatible with Epson, Sony Projectors, also can't work with TVs)

❤【Outstanding Features】❤ Our dlp link 3d glasses adopts the newest active shutter technology, super fast 144Hz refresh rate, High definition, no ghosting images, no flickering, delivers a great 3D viewing experience for you !

❤【Left/Right Eye Rotation】❤ If you have our Active 3D Glasses on and don't see the effect of 3D, just need to single clicking the power button again to flip the left and right eye views; Very convenient, no need to operate the dlp projector.

❤【Long Lasting Battery】❤ The active 3d dlp glasses comes with built-in high capacity rechargeable battery, continuous working 45 hours after fully charged with USB , standby time 180 days; Auto 5 seconds Stand by and 5 minutes Shut Off, save energy and stable.

❤【Lightweight & Comfortable】❤ Lightweight and portable to take, also can be worn very comfortably in front of regular glasses, comfortable to wear for a long time ; The DLP 3d glasses comes with a micro usb cable for charging, a cleaning cloth, a cloth pouch for storage, a zippered glasses case and the manual.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars349 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
